Description: Papyrus document with 7 lines of Coptic text on one side, written along the fibres (recto). Mounted with EA 75305, 75304, 75303, 75302, 75301.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118076) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118076)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
